text: Gong Ji-cheol (; born July 10, 1979), better known by his stage name Gong Yoo (), is a South Korean actor. He is best known for his roles in television dramas The 1st Shop of Coffee Prince (2007) Guardian: The Lonely and Great God (2016â€“2017), Squid Game (2021), and the movies Silenced (2011), Train to Busan (2016), and The Age of Shadows (2016). He was born in Busan, South Korea. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean television actors Category:South Korean models Category:Actors from Busan
title: Gong Yoo
